title: what ?
body: so i got banned for 14 days for no reason,they were 3 premades reported me just because i picked kog jungle and i was doing good but they still report me so wtf? and then before that game we had a lee sin who trollpicked and he reported me ofc because he was 1/6 and then before that game i again ,so... wtf? why am I being reported when they are trolling? please explain that to me riot?

replies.body: Hmmmm it looks like this account was banned not due to reports, but because of the language used during the in-game chat which was directed at your own teammates. I don't want to expose your personal chat information here on the boards, but if you reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) we can provide all of the context there.
